## Multi-User & Organizations

**Phase:** Phase 6 - Enterprise & Advanced Features
**Timeline:** 10-12 weeks
**Section:** 6.1

### Goal
Enterprise-ready with advanced features

### Impact
Enables enterprise deployment

### Effort Estimate
3 weeks

### Priority
P2

### Tasks

- [ ] Add organization/workspace support
- [ ] Implement role-based access control (RBAC)
- [ ] Create user management dashboard
- [ ] Add SSO integration (SAML, OAuth)
- [ ] Implement user quotas and limits
- [ ] Create audit logging

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All tasks completed
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Tests passing (unit + integration)
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality
